mapper.select: SELECT * FROM r_media_tag_${num} WHERE media_id = #{media_id} AND tag_id = #{tag_id} AND `type` = #{type} LIMIT 1
SELECT rtm.media_id FROM r_tag_media_${num} rtm LEFT JOIN t_music tm ON tm.id = rtm.media_id AND tm.status = 0 WHERE rtm.tag_id = #{tag_id} AND rtm.`type` = 0 ORDER BY tm.publish_time DESC
SELECT rtm.media_id FROM r_tag_media_${num} rtm LEFT JOIN t_video tv ON tv.id = rtm.media_id AND tv.status = 0 WHERE rtm.tag_id = #{tag_id} AND rtm.`type` = 1 ORDER BY tv.mtime DESC
SELECT rtm.media_id FROM r_tag_media_${num} rtm LEFT JOIN t_fav_list tf ON tf.id = rtm.media_id AND tf.status = 0 WHERE rtm.tag_id = #{tag_id} AND rtm.`type` = 3 ORDER BY tf.ctime DESC
